components.description:
A yellow face with a frown and closed, downcast eyes, as if aching with sorrow or pain. May convey a variety of unhappy emotions, including disappointment, grief, stress, regret, and remorse.

Similar to ðŸ˜” Pensive Face, but with a sadder, more hurt expression. Samsung’s design previously featured an expression closer to ðŸ˜• Confused Face.

title: Disappointed Face

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.definition: A sad face with a frowning mouth and disappointedÂ eyes. Not to be confused with theÂ pensive faceÂ which is more remorseful. Disappointed Face http://emojipedia.org/disappointed-face/
emoji_net_data.name: disappointed face

bn:00097146a: Troubled persistently especially with petty annoyances
Troubled persistently especially with petty annoyances.

bn:00112813a: Experiencing or marked by or causing sadness or sorrow or discontent

bn:00101559a: Marked by low spirits; showing no enthusiasm

bn:00101571a: Afflicted with or marked by anxious uneasiness or trouble or grief.
Afflicted with or marked by anxious uneasiness or trouble or grief

bn:00110036a: Feeling mentally uncomfortable because something is missing or wrong.
Experiencing or showing sorrow or unhappiness- Christina Rossetti

bn:00086883v: Fail to meet the hopes or expectations of

bn:00084388v: To cry out with a shrill voice; to utter a sudden, sharp outcry, or shrill, loud cry, as in fright or extreme pain; to shriek; to screech.
To utter a sudden and loud outcry, as in joy, triumph, or exultation, or to attract attention, to animate soldiers, etc.
To utter a sudden and loud outcry.
To speak with a loud, excited voice.
To utter in a loud or distinct voice.

bn:00095465v: Disturb the balance or stability of

bn:00089535v: To physically feel a damage, a pain, a disease or a punishment.
Feel pain or be in pain

bn:00088599v: To look angry or sullen, wrinkle one's forehead, as if to signal disapproval.
Look angry or sullen, wrinkle one's forehead, as if to signal disapproval

bn:00059926n: Sports: unexpected victory of a competitor.

An upset occurs in a competition, frequently in electoral politics or sports, when the party popularly expected to win, is defeated by an underdog whom the majority expects to lose, defying the conventional wisdom.
In a contest, especially in sport, when an underdog beats the strong favourite
An unexpected victory of a competitor that was not favored.

bn:00026402n: State of physical and/or psychological dejectedness, which can lead to unhappiness, pessimism and mistrust.
A mental state characterized by a pessimistic sense of inadequacy and a despondent lack of activity
Depression is a state of low mood and aversion to activity that can affect a person's thoughts, behavior, feelings and sense of well-being.
A state of low mood, also known as melancholy
State of low mood and aversion to activity

bn:00068782n: Sadness is emotional pain associated with, or characterized by feelings of disadvantage, loss, despair, helplessness, sorrow, and rage.
Emotions experienced when not in a state of well-being
Sadness is emotional pain associated with, or characterized by feelings of disadvantage, loss, despair, helplessness and sorrow.

bn:00027430n: Disappointment is the feeling of dissatisfaction that follows the failure of expectations to manifest.
A feeling of dissatisfaction that results when your expectations are not realized
The emotion felt when a strongly held expectation is not met.
Disappointment is the feeling of dissatisfaction that follows the failure of expectations or hopes to manifest.

bn:00025856n: In psychology, frustration is a common emotional response to opposition.
The feeling that accompanies an experience of being thwarted in attaining your goals
An emotional response to circumstances where one is obstructed from arriving at a goal.
